title: Make your art Move - Blender 2D animation tutorial
description:
Want to take your 2D character to the next level? In this tutorial, I'll show you how to transform your flat 2D illustration into a stunning 3D animation using Blender. Learn step-by-step how to add depth, rig your character, and animate them with dynamic motion. Whether you're an illustrator or 3D artist, this guide will help you bring your artwork to life with Blender's powerful tools. Perfect for creating eye-catching animations for games, videos, or your portfolio!
